name: colon carcinoma
definition: A colon cancer that has_material_basis_in abnormally proliferating cells derives_from epithelial cells. [url:http\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carcinoma]

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, AMG 900 inhibited growth of an AZD1152-resistant colon carcinoma cell line harboring AURKB W221L in culture (PMID: 20935223).

references.title: Preclinical evaluation of AMG 900, a novel potent and highly selective pan-aurora kinase inhibitor with activity in taxane-resistant tumor cell lines.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In preclinical studies, CEP-32496 (RXDX-105) reduced tumor volume and promoted tumor regression in xenograft models of a BRAF V600E mutant human colon carcinoma cell line (PMID: 22319199).

references.title: CEP-32496: a novel orally active BRAF(V600E) inhibitor with selective cellular and in vivo antitumor activity.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, S-49076, in combination with Avastin (bevacizumab) arrested tumor growth in cell line xenograft models of colon carcinoma with previous resistance to Avastin (bevacizumab) (PMID: 23804704).

references.title: S49076 is a novel kinase inhibitor of MET, AXL, and FGFR with strong preclinical activity alone and in association with bevacizumab.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: Preclinical shRNA mediated-inhibition of PTEN-induced putative kinase 1 (PINK1) in colon carcinoma cells with MSH6 loss resulted in synthetic lethality, suggesting PINK1 may be a promising therapeutic target for MSH6 deficient cancer cells (PMID: 21242281).

references.title: Parallel high-throughput RNA interference screens identify PINK1 as a potential therapeutic target for the treatment of DNA mismatch repair-deficient cancers.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, FH535 inhibited beta-catenin/TCF-dependent transactivation and demonstrated toxicity in colon carcinoma cells harboring an APC mutation in culture (PMID: 18347139).

references.title: A small-molecule inhibitor of Tcf/beta-catenin signaling down-regulates PPARgamma and PPARdelta activities.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, the pan-Notch inhibitor, BMS-906024, inhibited growth of colon carcinoma xenografts (PMID: 26005526).

references.title: Discovery of Clinical Candidate BMS-906024: A Potent Pan-Notch Inhibitor for the Treatment of Leukemia and Solid Tumors.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, colon carcinoma cells were sensitive to GSK1904529A in both culture and xenograft models, resulting in cell cycle arrest, decreased phosphorylation of Igf1r, and inhibition of tumor growth (PMID: 19383820).

references.title: Antitumor activity of GSK1904529A, a small-molecule inhibitor of the insulin-like growth factor-I receptor tyrosine kinase.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, SP600125 induced cell death in colon carcinoma cells deficient for p53 (PMID: 22438244).

references.title: Selective killing of p53-deficient cancer cells by SP600125.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Mps-BAY1 inhibited cell cycle progression and induced cell death of colon carcinoma cells in culture (PMID: 23933817).

references.title: Characterization of novel MPS1 inhibitors with preclinical anticancer activity.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Mps-BAY2a inhibited cell cycle progression and induced cell death of colon carcinoma cells in culture (PMID: 23933817).

references.title: Characterization of novel MPS1 inhibitors with preclinical anticancer activity.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Mps-BAY2b inhibited cell cycle progression and induced cell death of colon carcinoma cells in culture (PMID: 23933817).

references.title: Characterization of novel MPS1 inhibitors with preclinical anticancer activity.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Mps-BAY1, in combination with paclitaxel, had increased efficacy in inhibiting cell proliferation of colon carcinoma cell in culture (PMID: 23933817).

references.title: Characterization of novel MPS1 inhibitors with preclinical anticancer activity.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Mps-BAY2a, in combination with paclitaxel, had increased efficacy in inhibiting cell proliferation of colon carcinoma cell in culture (PMID: 23933817).

references.title: Characterization of novel MPS1 inhibitors with preclinical anticancer activity.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Mps-BAY2b, in combination with paclitaxel, had increased efficacy in inhibiting cell proliferation of colon carcinoma cell in culture (PMID: 23933817).

references.title: Characterization of novel MPS1 inhibitors with preclinical anticancer activity.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study the TTK (MPS1) inhibitor, MPI-0479605, inhibited cell cycle progression of colon carcinoma cells deficient for Tp53 with equivalent efficacy to cells with wild-type Tp53 (PMID: 21980130).

references.title: Characterization of the cellular and antitumor effects of MPI-0479605, a small-molecule inhibitor of the mitotic kinase Mps1.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study the TTK (MPS1) inhibitor, MPI-0479605, inhibited cell cycle progression of colon carcinoma cells deficient for Tp53 with equivalent efficacy to cells with wild-type Tp53 (PMID: 21980130).

references.title: Characterization of the cellular and antitumor effects of MPI-0479605, a small-molecule inhibitor of the mitotic kinase Mps1.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study the TTK (MPS1) inhibitor, MPI-0479605, inhibited tumor growth of colon carcinoma xenografts, however, the toxicity was significant (PMID: 21980130).

references.title: Characterization of the cellular and antitumor effects of MPI-0479605, a small-molecule inhibitor of the mitotic kinase Mps1.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, R547 inhibited proliferation of colon carcinoma cell lines harboring wild-type Tp53 and Rb1 in culture and reduced tumor growth in xenograft models (PMID: 17121911).

references.title: In vitro and in vivo activity of R547: a potent and selective cyclin-dependent kinase inhibitor currently in phase I clinical trials.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, R547 inhibited proliferation of colon carcinoma cell lines harboring mutant Tp53 and wild-type Rb1 (PMID: 17121911).

references.title: In vitro and in vivo activity of R547: a potent and selective cyclin-dependent kinase inhibitor currently in phase I clinical trials.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, KW-2450 treatment inhibited Igf1r signaling and resulted in moderate tumor growth inhibition in a colon carcinoma xenograft model (PMID: 26850678).

references.title: Preclinical and first-in-human phase I studies of KW-2450, an oral tyrosine kinase inhibitor with insulin-like growth factor receptor-1/insulin receptor selectivity.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, BI 885578 inhibited proliferation of colon carcinoma cell lines harboring IGF2 over expression and KRAS G12A in culture, and reduced tumor growth in xenograft models (PMID: 26438154).

references.title: BI 885578, a Novel IGF1R/INSR Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor with Pharmacokinetic Properties That Dissociate Antitumor Efficacy and Perturbation of Glucose Homeostasis.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, AURKB W221L was detected as a secondary mutation in colon carcinoma cells with acquired resistance to Barasertib (AZD1152) in culture (PMID: 20935223).

references.title: Preclinical evaluation of AMG 900, a novel potent and highly selective pan-aurora kinase inhibitor with activity in taxane-resistant tumor cell lines.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a clinical case study, a patient with TMB-high colon carcinoma harboring homozygous JAK1 W690* demonstrated resistance to treatment with Keytruda (pembrolizumab) (PMID: 27903500).

references.title: Primary Resistance to PD-1 Blockade Mediated by JAK1/2 Mutations.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, colon carcinoma cells over expressing IDH1 R132H demonstrated increased sensitivity to Talazoparib (BMN-673)-induced growth inhibition in culture (PMID: 28148839).

references.title: 2-Hydroxyglutarate produced by neomorphic IDH mutations suppresses homologous recombination and induces PARP inhibitor sensitivity.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, colon carcinoma cells over expressing IDH1 R132H demonstrated increased sensitivity to Lynparza (olaparib)-induced growth inhibition in culture (PMID: 28148839).

references.title: 2-Hydroxyglutarate produced by neomorphic IDH mutations suppresses homologous recombination and induces PARP inhibitor sensitivity.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Libtayo (cemiplimab) reduced tumor growth and improved survival of knock-in mouse models expressing human PDCD1 (PD-1) that were engrafted with mouse colon carcinoma cells (PMID: 28265006).

references.title: Characterization of the Anti-PD-1 Antibody REGN2810 and Its Antitumor Activity in Human PD-1 Knock-In Mice.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, treatment with the combination of CFI-402257 and an anti-PD-1 antibody induced tumor regression in 2/8 tumors in syngeneic mouse models of colon carcinoma, and no regressions were demonstrated in mice treated with single agent CFI-402257 or anti-PD-1 antibody (PMID: 28270606).

references.title: Functional characterization of CFI-402257, a potent and selective Mps1/TTK kinase inhibitor, for the treatment of cancer.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, UD-017 inhibited tumor growth in cell line xenograft models of colon carcinoma (J Clin Oncol 35, 2017 (suppl; abstr e14085)).

references.title: Preclinical in vitro and in vivo evaluation of antitumor activity of UD-017, a novel selective and orally available CDK7 inhibitor, in colorectal cancer.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, the addition of MU380 resulted in increased sensitivity to Droxia (hydroxyurea) in colon carcinoma cell lines in culture, leading to decreased proliferation (PMID: 28619751).

references.title: Synthesis and Profiling of a Novel Potent Selective Inhibitor of CHK1 Kinase Possessing Unusual N-trifluoromethylpyrazole Pharmacophore Resistant to Metabolic N-dealkylation.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, CA-170 activated peripheral T cells inhibited tumor growth in mouse models of colon carcinoma (Ann Oncol. 2017 Sep 18; 28 (Suppl_5): Abstract 1141PD).

references.title: CA-170, a first in class oral small molecule dual inhibitor of immune checkpoints PD-L1 and VISTA, demonstrates tumor growth inhibition in pre-clinical models and promotes T cell activation in Phase 1 study

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, the combination of Camptothecin and CHIR-124 demonstrated synergy in TP53-mutant colon carcinoma cell lines in culture, resulting in increased growth inhibition (PMID: 17255282).

references.title: CHIR-124, a novel potent inhibitor of Chk1, potentiates the cytotoxicity of topoisomerase I poisons in vitro and in vivo.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, CEP-28122 did not inhibit tumor growth in cell line xenograft models of ALK-negative colon carcinoma (PMID: 22203728).

references.title: CEP-28122, a highly potent and selective orally active inhibitor of anaplastic lymphoma kinase with antitumor activity in experimental models of human cancers.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, radiation effects were enhanced by the addition of XL-844 in colon carcinoma cells in culture, demonstrating inhibition of DNA repair, mitotic catastrophe, and decreased cell survival (PMID: 20024691).

references.title: A novel Chk inhibitor, XL-844, increases human cancer cell radiosensitivity through promotion of mitotic catastrophe.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, cell lines harboring CTNNB1 hotspot mutations, including a colon carcinoma cell line harboring CTNNB1 S45del, demonstrated increased sensitivity to NTRC 0066-0 compared to cell lines with wild-type CTNNB1 or an isogenic cell line lacking the CTNNB1 mutation, in culture (PMID: 28751540).

references.title: TTK Inhibitors as a Targeted Therapy for CTNNB1 (β-catenin) Mutant Cancers.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, cell lines harboring CTNNB1 hotspot mutations, including a colon carcinoma cell line harboring CTNNB1 S45del, demonstrated increased sensitivity to Mps-BAY2b compared to cell lines with wild-type CTNNB1 in culture (PMID: 28751540).

references.title: TTK Inhibitors as a Targeted Therapy for CTNNB1 (β-catenin) Mutant Cancers.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, cell lines harboring CTNNB1 hotspot mutations, including a colon carcinoma cell line harboring CTNNB1 S45del, demonstrated increased sensitivity to NMS-P715 compared to cell lines with wild-type CTNNB1 in culture (PMID: 28751540).

references.title: TTK Inhibitors as a Targeted Therapy for CTNNB1 (β-catenin) Mutant Cancers.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, cell lines harboring CTNNB1 hotspot mutations, including a colon carcinoma cell line harboring CTNNB1 S45del, demonstrated increased sensitivity to BAY1161909 compared to cell lines with wild-type CTNNB1 in culture (PMID: 28751540).

references.title: TTK Inhibitors as a Targeted Therapy for CTNNB1 (β-catenin) Mutant Cancers.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, cell lines harboring CTNNB1 hotspot mutations, including a colon carcinoma cell line harboring CTNNB1 S45del, demonstrated increased sensitivity to BAY1217389 compared to cell lines with wild-type CTNNB1 in culture (PMID: 28751540).

references.title: TTK Inhibitors as a Targeted Therapy for CTNNB1 (β-catenin) Mutant Cancers.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, cell lines harboring CTNNB1 hotspot mutations, including a colon carcinoma cell line harboring CTNNB1 S45del, demonstrated increased sensitivity to Mps1-IN-1 compared to cell lines with wild-type CTNNB1 in culture (PMID: 28751540).

references.title: TTK Inhibitors as a Targeted Therapy for CTNNB1 (β-catenin) Mutant Cancers.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, cell lines harboring CTNNB1 hotspot mutations, including a colon carcinoma cell line harboring CTNNB1 S45del demonstrated increased sensitivity to MPI-0479605 compared to cell lines with wild-type CTNNB1 in culture (PMID: 28751540).

references.title: TTK Inhibitors as a Targeted Therapy for CTNNB1 (β-catenin) Mutant Cancers.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, ATOR-1015 inhibited tumor growth in a syngeneic mouse model of colon carcinoma expressing human OX40 (TNFRSF4), with CTLA-4-expressing regulatory T-cells (PMID: 30975201).

references.title: The CTLA-4 x OX40 bispecific antibody ATOR-1015 induces anti-tumor effects through tumor-directed immune activation.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, treatment with SB 11285 delayed tumor growth and reduced tumor volume in a syngeneic mouse model of colon carcinoma (Journal of Clinical Oncology 2017 35:15_suppl, e14616).

references.title: Preclinical studies of SB 11285, a novel STING agonist for immuno-oncology.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, treatment with SB 11285 combined with an anti-CTLA4 antibody delayed tumor growth and reduced tumor volume in a syngeneic mouse model of colon carcinoma (Journal of Clinical Oncology 2017 35:15_suppl, e14616).

references.title: Preclinical studies of SB 11285, a novel STING agonist for immuno-oncology.

clinicalTrials.title: Study of Imprime PGG in Combination With Cetuximab in Subjects With Recurrent or Progressive KRAS Wild Type Colorectal Cancer
Genistein in Treatment of Metastatic Colorectal Cancer
Dose Escalation and Expansion Study of GSK3359609 in Subjects With Selected Advanced Solid Tumors (INDUCE-1)
Phase I Trial of Universal Donor NK Cell Therapy in Combination With ALT803
